articles.author: Mathew Murphy
articles.title: Tragedy Hits Nicole Kidman’s Family Hours Before Venice Award Win - The Daily Beast
articles.description: Nicole Kidman left the Venice Film Festival hours before winning the prestigious Best Actress award, after learning that her beloved mother in Australia had died.
articles.content:
Nicole Kidman has revealed that her beloved mother, Janelle Kidman, died just hours before Nicole won the Best Actress award at the Venice Film Festival on Saturday.
Kidman, 57, said in a statement … [+2128 chars]
